featured.text: At the end of the class, you __(25)__ with you classmates the meals you have created, and you will leave with recipe handouts and , more importantly, the ability to cook two weeks of fantastic, low-cost meals.

definition.zh_def: 發放的資料或文件，通常用於會議或課堂上提供給參與者的資訊。
definition.en_def: A document or piece of information distributed to participants at a meeting or class.
definition.example: The teacher gave each student a handout with the lesson summary.
